    • encrypt_shuffled

      public static String[][] encrypt_shuffled(String phrase, float ratio, boolean writetofile)
      [Internal Method] encrypt_shuffled
      Parameters:
      phrase - (String) The phrase which to encrypt.
      ratio - (Float) The ratio at which to encrypt it.
      writetofile - (Boolean) write locally to file. *DEBUG PUROSES.*
      Returns:
      String[][] where encrypt[0] are the (String[]) Blocks, encrypt[1][0] is the (String) Key.

    • encrypt

      public static String[] encrypt(String phrase, float ratio, int blocksize, boolean writetofile)
      [External Method] encrypt()
      Parameters:
      phrase - (String) The phrase to encrypt.
      ratio - (Float) The ratio at which to encrypt it.
      blocksize - (Integer) The blocksize**** WILL BE OVERWRITTEN WITH 8**.
      writetofile - (Boolean) Write to files locally. DEBUG PURPOSES.
      Returns:
      (String[]) The cipher and key where return[0] = cipher and return[1] = key.

    • decrypt

      public static String decrypt(String cipher, String key)
      [External Method] decrypt
      Parameters:
      cipher - (String) The cipher in the form '12.483498A213.3498A...'
      key - (String) the key in the form //18.229193D0.888R116S123F\\ (e.g.)
      Returns:
      (String) The phrase recovered from the cipher.

      [External Method] encrypt_bins Encrypt a String[] of binary
      Parameters:
      bins - (String[]) The String[] of binary to encrypt.
      blocksize - (Integer) 8** WILL ADDRESS IN FUTURE VERSION!
      TRI_RATIO - (Float) The ratio at which to operate at.
      Returns:
      (String[]) where return[0] = (String) cipher, and return[1] = (Float) angle.

      Returns:

    • shufflecipherblock

      public static String[] shufflecipherblock(String[] cipher, int[] replaces)
      [Internal Method] shuffleCipherBlock() Shuffles a cipher block based on the replacement indices normally generated through generate_replacement_indices_for()
      Parameters:
      cipher - (String[]) The blocks of the cipher.
      replaces - (Integer[]) The replacement array either manually specified or SPAN-generated. *cipher.size = replaces.size*
      Returns:
      (String[]) The resequenced cipher blocks.

    • generate_replacement_indices_for

      public static int[] generate_replacement_indices_for(float degree, float ratio, int start, int end)
      [Internal/External Method] generate_replacement_indices_for()
      Parameters:
      degree - (Float) The degree which to operate at.
      ratio - (Float) The ratio which to operate at.
      start - (Integer) Start for that cipher to augment formula.
      end - (Integer) End for that cipher to augment formula.
      Returns:
      (Integer[]) Replacement indexes for this particular degree, ratio, start, end. (F2)
